titles.title: Honoring the Educational Commission for Foreign Medical Graduates (ECFMG) for fifty years of distinguished service.

bill.summary: Recognizes and honors the Educational Commission for Foreign Medical Graduates (ECFMG) for its 50 years of distinguished service.
